invocations.name: Agonizing Blast
invocations.desc: I add my charisma modifier to Eldritch Blast damage.

invocations.name: Grasp of Hadar
invocations.desc: Once per turn when I hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, I can move that creature 10 feet straight toward me.

invocations.name: Repelling Blast
invocations.desc: When I hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, I can push them 10 feet away from me.

invocations.name: Mask of Many Faces
invocations.desc: I can cast 'disguise self' at will without expending a spell slot.

invocations.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
invocations.desc: I can inscribe rituals in my Book of Shadows. Rituals can be from any class's spell list, can only be cast as rituals, and must be of a level equal to or less than half of my warlock level (rounded up).
